author: holiman
content: Regarding "cool" new client side feature-rich UI possibilities, what's your take on javafx and silverlight (2.0)? They seem to be pretty suitable for UI-redressing. I have not looked into it them (yet), but definitely plan to.

author: pdp
content: yes, definitely. UI redressing is quite old technique. actually you can apply it to pretty much everything you can imagine.
